level.heading: Registration requirement
level.text: No person shall offer or sell a security in the District unless the security is registered under this chapter, the security or transaction is exempt under ยง 31-5604.01 or ยง 31-5604.02, or the security is a federal covered security.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 13-203, see notes following ยง 31-5601.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Section 806 of D.C. Law 13-203 provides: "Titles III and IV shall apply as of June 1, 2001."
